subScenes.name: 问候与开场
subScenes.description: 游客向咨询员礼貌打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! I'm new in town and looking for must-see spots.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！我是刚到这儿的，想找必去的景点。

responses.text: Sure! I'd love to help. What kind of places do you like?
responses.text_cn: 当然！我很乐意帮忙。你喜欢哪种类型的地方？

responses.text: Oh cool! History, nature, or shopping?
responses.text_cn: 哇，太好了！喜欢历史、自然还是购物？

responses.text: Just tell me what you want.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用I'm new in town自然引出需求

qaPairs.speakerText: I'd really appreciate some recommendations — I only have two days.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我特别需要一些建议，我只有两天时间。

responses.text: No problem! I'll pick the top 3 based on your time.
responses.text_cn: 没问题！我按你的时间选前三个。

responses.text: Two days? Got it. Central sights only, then!
responses.text_cn: 两天？明白，只推市中心的！

responses.text: Okay, here you go.

subScenes.name: 询问推荐与距离
subScenes.description: 游客确认景点推荐并询问交通距离

qaPairs.speakerText: Is the Old Town far from here? Can I walk?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 老城区离这儿远吗？能走过去吗？

responses.text: Only 15 mins on foot — it's super close!
Yeah, you can walk. It's like a short stroll.
Walk? Nah, take bus 12.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Can I walk?自然确认步行可行性

qaPairs.speakerText: What about the mountain view spot? Is it worth the trip?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那个观山景点值得专程去吗？

responses.text: Absolutely! Best sunset view in the city — but it’s 30 mins by bus.
responses.text_cn: 绝对值得！全城最佳日落，但要坐30分钟公交。

responses.text: If you’ve got time, yes. Otherwise, skip it.
It's okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Is it worth the trip?评估性价比

subScenes.name: 确认票价与时间
subScenes.description: 游客了解门票价格和开放时间

qaPairs.speakerText: How much is the entrance fee for the museum?

responses.text: It's $12 for adults, but under 18s are free!
Ten bucks. And it's free on Sundays.
Free.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用How much is...直接问价格

qaPairs.speakerText: Do they close early on weekends?

responses.text: Nah, same hours — open till 7pm daily.
Yes, closes at 5 on Sat/Sun.
Check the sign.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Do they close early?确认特殊时间

subScenes.name: 索取地图与道别
subScenes.description: 游客请求地图并礼貌结束对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Could I get a free map of the city?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能给我一张免费城市地图吗？

responses.text: Of course! Here’s one with all the top spots marked.
responses.text_cn: 当然！这张标了所有热门景点。

responses.text: Sure thing. Grab one from the rack.
Yeah, here.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Could I get...礼貌索取物品

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much! You've been super helpful.

responses.text: Anytime! Have an amazing trip!
No prob! Enjoy the sights!
Bye.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用Thanks so much表达真诚感谢
